Posts.Content: medfordmom wrote: Three weeks ago I noticed that I have two very identifiable lumps on my left breast.  I went to my doctor (nurse practioner) who agreed that she too could feel them and suggested an ultrasound and additional mammogram right away.  I have gotten the results back from each and they show nothing.  Now I can feel a lump in each armpit that is somewhat tender in addition to the other two lumps and I am getting very nervous.  My doctor says that if everything is negative on my results that I shouldnt worry, but what are these lumps that seem to be multiplhying?  I am 48 now and went through menopause at 37 immediately after the birth of my second son so I dont think it is hormoes, but maybe it is.  Am I just overreacting or should I be concerned?  I feel like something is wrong, but dont know what to do.  Desperate for some advice. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Feeling like my doctor won't listen to me medfordmom Cowgirl13

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2011 03:45PM medfordmom wrote: Thank you for the advice everyone.  I never go to the doctor and dont even have a PCP...Do you think I can just call a breast surgeon and make an appointment?  Will they even talk to me?  I guess it couldn't hurt to try.  We live in a very small town, not even sure there is one :-) but I will start looking.  Thank you again!
Posts.Title: Feeling like my doctor won't listen to me medfordmom Cowgirl13

Posts.Content: Oct 20, 2011 09:31AM medfordmom wrote: Appt made for Monday am at 9:00!!  Im feeling so much better just having made that progress.  Thank you all again for your advice!
Posts.Title: Feeling like my doctor won't listen to me medfordmom Cowgirl13

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2011 08:10PM medfordmom wrote: Thank you for your comments and advice.  I called the office this afternoon and explained my concerns and the NP promised to refer me to a BS.  I got a call late this afternoon to schedule an appointment with the BS so I am feeling much better.  I just want to know one way or the other what is going on.  This site is really great!
Posts.Title: Feeling like my doctor won't listen to me medfordmom Cowgirl13

Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2011 10:36AM medfordmom wrote: Just wanted to update and thank you folks for your advice.  I saw the breast surgeon this am and although she can feel the lump, she says I have dense breasts and not to worry about it.  She believes it is just breast tissue and doesn't warrant biopsying it.  She recommended Primrose oil instead...She says she can order an MRI if it would make me feel better, but insurance probably won't pay for it.  Soooo, I guess that is that.  Sure hope she is right. :-)  Good luck to all of you!!
Posts.Title: Feeling like my doctor won't listen to me medfordmom Cowgirl13
